SWFSprite->stopSound

(PHP 5 <= 5.3.0, PECL ming SVN)

SWFSprite->stopSound —

Description

void SWFSprite::stopSound ( SWFSound $sount )
Warning

This function is currently not documented; only its argument list is available.

Return Values

No value is returned.
